title: What are the best happy birthday songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: Me thinks it's past time to break with the 'stiff', historical convention. I think the best birthday song is the one, sung like a military call-and-response cadence. Caller: I don't know but I've been told. Response: I don't know but I've been told.  Caller: Someone here is getting old.  Response: Someone here is getting old.  Caller: I don't know but it's been said. Response: I don't know but it's been said.  Caller: Someone's face is turning red. Response: Someone's face is turning red.  Caller: Sound off! Response: Happy! Caller: Sound off! Response: Birthday!  Caller: Sound off! Response: Hap-py Birth-day, [much louder] HAPPY [quick pause] BIRTHDAY!!

Birthday is a day when someone birth in this world its amazing and happier day for people most of parents enjoy it becouse god gift them a beautiful baby . I like verious song but the song happy birth day to u .. iis good song it has inclosed most happy movements in words its such an amazing song
